Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2017 12:15AM Prue_pueng wrote: Hi I am 36 years old triple negative breast cancer with ki67 80% (knew test result just 2 days before my birthday). I decided to do lumpectomy just because mastectomy sound too scary and the decision was made before I know that it's triple negative and the ki67 is so high. Now I'm worry about recurrence. My dad and his siblings are died from recurrence from other type of cancer.
